APPLICATION.question: BUFFERING HO RHA HAI
APPLICATION.answer: SETTINGS PE JAO, CLEAR CACHE, CLEAR DATA, NETWORK RESET, RESTART DEVICE

APPLICATION.question: DOWNLOADING ISSUE
APPLICATION.answer: CLEAR DATS , CLEAR CACHE , NETWORK RESET RESTART DEVICE .

APPLICATION.question: NOTES OPEN NHI HOTE ?
APPLICATION.answer: UPDATE GOOGLE DRIVE AND ADOBE ACROBAT PDF VIEWER..

APPLICATION.question: CLASS OFF HOTI HAI UPDATE NHI MILTA HAI .KAISE CHECK KREIN HAM .

APPLICATION.question: BATCH PURCHASE HONE KE BAAD BATCH KO KAISE DEKHE
APPLICATION.answer: BATCHES CATEGORY KO OPEN KRKE MY BATCH CATEGORY CHECK KIJIYE

APPLICATION.question: PASSWORD KAISE CHANGE KREIN ?
APPLICATION.answer: FORGOT PASSWORD SE YA APPLICATION PROFILE SECTION MEIN APKO CHANGE PASSWORD KA OPTION ALREADY DIYA HAI USKE THOUGH BHI KAR SAKTE HAI .

APPLICATION.question: How to verify the Email ?
APPLICATION.answer: MAIL VERIFY NA JONE PAR . APPLICATION PROFILE SECTION KO OPEN KRKE MAIL VERIFY OPTION KO CLICK KRKE OTP KE THOUGH SELF KAR SAKTE HO .

APPLICATION.question: MERI APPLICATION DARK MODE PAR CHALI GYI HAI KAISE USKO LIGHT MODE PR KARIN?
APPLICATION.answer: PROFILE INTERFACE KO OPEN KRKE DARK MODE OPTION SE KR SAKTE HAI

APPLICATION.question: TEST KA SOLUTION KAISE MILEGA ?
APPLICATION.answer: TEST KO ATTEMPT KRNE KE BAAD SUBMIT TEST PAR CLICK KRO CLICK KRNE LE BAAD VIEW SOLUTION PR CLICK KARKE SOLUTION QUESTION WISE CHECK KRO

APPLICATION.question: KYA ID KO LOGOUT LARNE KE BAAD ID FIR SE LOGIN KAR SAKTE HAI ?
APPLICATION.answer: YES, KAR SAKTE HAI . FORGOT PASSWORD KARKE FIR SE ID KO LOGIIN KIYA JA SAKTA HAI.

APPLICATION.question: IOS , (IPHONE) KE KISI BHI DEVICE MEIN APPLICATION NHI CHALTA HAI ?
APPLICATION.answer: APPLICATION IOS MEIN WORK NHI KRTA HAI . BUT AP WEB LOGIN KE THOUGH CLASSES APPLICATION KI TARHA HE RUN KAR SAKTE HAI.

APPLICATION.question: 2 STUDENT EK SATH SAME BATCH 2 DIFFERENT DEVICE MEIN USE KR SAKTE HAI ?
APPLICATION.answer: NO, STUDENT 2 DIFFERENT DEVICE MEIN USE NHI KAR SAKTE  SAME ID

APPLICATION.question: DOWNLOAD VIDEOS DELETE KAISE KREIN ?
APPLICATION.answer: DOWNLOAD OPTION MEIN DUSTBIN ICON KO CLICK KRKE

APPLICATION.question: FREE BATCH KO ACCESS KAISE KREIN .
APPLICATION.answer: SPECIAL BATCHES CATEGORY MEIN CLICK KARKE AVAILABLE FREE BATCH KO ENROLL KAR SAKTE HAI .

APPLICATION.question: APPLICATION KE NOTIFICATION KAHA SE CHECK KREIN ?
APPLICATION.answer: APPLICATION KO OPEN BELL ICON KO CLICK KRNE PAR ..

WEB.question: WEB TOKEN MISMATCH ISSUE
WEB.answer: LAPTOP, PC  RESTART ADJUST TIME AND TIME ZONE

WEB.question: web buffering issue is there.
WEB.answer: RELOAD DEVICE ,BROWSER UPDATE , RESET NETWORK , WIFI ROUTER REFRESH.

WEB.question: WEB LOGIN KARNE PAR KYA CLASSES DOWNLOAD HO SAKTI HAI?
WEB.answer: NO , CLASSES DOWNLOAD NHI HONGI WEB KE THOUGH

WEB.question: WEB PAR TEST ATTEMPT KAR SAKTE HAI ?
WEB.answer: YES WEB TEST SERIES OPTION PR CLICK KRKE TEST ATTEMPT KAR SAKTE HAI

DOUBT.question: DOUBT KAISE POST KREIN ?
DOUBT.answer: MORE OPTION PR CLICK KRKE DOUBT SECTION OPEN KRENGE THEN  MATHS ENGLISH REASONING OPTION KO CLICK KRENGE  UPLOAD IMAGE PR DIRECT CAMERA OPTION CHOOSE KRTE HUE DOUBT POST KRENGE.

DOUBT.question: DOUBT KA SOLUTION KAB TAK PROVIDE HOTA HAI .
DOUBT.answer: WITHIN 24 HR MEIN DOUBT KA ANSWER MILTA HAI .

E-BOOK.question: E-BOOK KO DOWNLOAD KAISE KRENGE.
E-BOOK.answer: EBOOK OPTION FREE HAI APKO ONLY READ KR SAKTE HO .

BOOK.question: RAKESH SIR KI BOOK KAISE BUY KR SALTE HAI APPLICATION SE?
BOOK.answer: OFFLINE , ONLINE AMAZON FLIPKART KE PURCHASE KR SAKTE HAI .

BOOK.question: BOOK KE VIDEO SOLUTION KAHA SE DEKH SALTE HAI .
BOOK.answer: VIDEO BOOK SECTION SE VIDEO SOLUTION Coupon code APPLY KRKE DEKH SAKTE HAI FREE

MAGAZINE.question: CURRENT AFFAIRS MAGAZINE KAISE ACCESS KREIN ?
MAGAZINE.answer: CURRENT AFFAIRS MAGAZINE GOOGLE DRIVE KE THOUGH APPLICATION SE ACCESS KR SAKTE HAI. EVERY MONTH.

PAYMENT.question: BATCH KO DIRECT BUY KAISE KREIN ?
PAYMENT.answer: APPLICATION DOWNLOAD KRNE KE BAAD BATCHES CATEGORY MEIN  EXAM CATEGORY KE ACCORDING BUY KR SAKTE HAI

PAYMENT.question: DOUBLE PAYMENT KA AMOUNT REFUND KAISE LE?
PAYMENT.answer: PAYMENT CUT HONE LE BAAD APNI REQUEST MENTION KRWAYE .

PAYMENT.question: BATCH PURCHASE KRNE KE LIYE KOI EMI OPTION AVAILABLE HAI .
PAYMENT.answer: NO , EMI OPTION AVAILABLE NHI HOGA ..

REFUND.question: BATCH REFUND KAISE KARWAYE?
REFUND.answer: APNI REQUEST 7 DAYS SE PEHLE MENTION KARWAYE ?

TRANSFER.question: GALTI SE PURCHASE BATCH KA TRANSFER KAISE KRWAYE ?
TRANSFER.answer: APNI REQUEST 7 DAYS SE PEHLE MENTION KARWAYE

BATCH.question: SSC AARAMBH PRATHAM, SANKALP BATCH KE VOD ADD NHI HUE HAI .?
BATCH.answer: EVERY SATURDAY BATCH ACTIVE KIYE JATE HAI .

BATCH.question: BATCH KI VALIDITY EXTEND HO SAKTI HAI ?
BATCH.answer: NO , BATCH KI VALIDITY EXTEND NHI HOTI HAI ..

CLASS.question: KYA BATCH KI CLASSES LIVE HONE KE BAAD APPLICATION SE REMOVE HP JATI HAI ?
CLASS.answer: NO, CLASS LIVE HONE LE BAAD APPLICATION SE REMOVE NHI HOTI HAI TILL VALIDITY CLASS KO ACCESS KR SAKTE HAI .

CLASS.question: TEACHER CLASSES KONSI LANGUAGE MEIN LETE HAI ..? KYA TEACHER ENGLISH MEIIN CLASSES LENGE ?
CLASS.answer: CLASSES TEACHER BILINGUAL PROVIDE KRWATE HAI JISME . TEACHER HINDI LANGUAGE OR ENGLISH LANGUAGE DONO HE COVER KRWATE HAI . BUT COMUNICATION LANGUAGE HINDI HE RAHEGA MOSTLY.

YOUTUBE.question: KYA YOUTUBE CHANNEL KI CLASSES KE NOTES PROVIDE HOTE HAI ?
YOUTUBE.answer: YES, VIDEO KE COMMENT BOX MEIN OR DISCRIPTION BOX MEIN PDF LINK MENTION KIYA JATA HAI .

TEACHER.question: KISI BHI TEACHER SE MILNE KI SUVIDHA HAI ?
TEACHER.answer: NO, TEACHER SE AP ESE NHI MIL SAKTE HAI MEETUP OR  SELECTION INTERVIEW THOUGH HE MIL SAKTE HAI .

PDF.question: PDF BILINGUAL PROVIDE HOTE?
PDF.answer: YES PDF BILINGUAL HE PROVIDE HOTE HAI. HAR BATCH MEIN .

CLASSES.question: WEEK MEIN KITNE DIN CLASSES PROVIDE HOTI HAI .?
CLASSES.answer: WEEK MEIN MONDAY TO SATURDAY CLASSES PROVIDE HOTI HAI
